item.description: Two superb films... John Travolta and Kyra Sedgwick and Robert Duvall in the first, a romantic film about life, love, and science.  . a film any chick would love, most men will agree is great! I love the first film with Travolta, playing a really nice guy in a country town who falls in love with Kyra Sedgewick's character....  Robert Duvall plays town doc, FORREST WHITAKER plays best friend, who gets another love interest in the film.
item.name: Phenomenon (because of changes we can do one)
